entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
